H0.text: What was the Spice Girls' debut single called. Say You'll Be There

H1.text: What was the Spice Girls' debut single called. 2 Become 1

H2.text: What was the Spice Girls' debut single called. Spice Up Your Life

H3.text: What was the Spice Girls' debut single called. Wannabe

A4.text: Wannabe" is the debut single by the British girl group the Spice Girls, released on 26 June 1996.

A5.text: As the Spice Girls' debut single, "Wannabe" has been credited for catapulting the band to global stardom and ushering in "Spicemania" in the late 1990s.
